column2: ENGLISH
The very sight of [From.GetFullName] fills you with a seething rage. Mere words cannot describe how much you despise that [From.GetManWoman].
You have found that you and [From.GetFullName] get along surprisingly well, and the two of you have formed a potentially life-long friendship.
You're why, but for some reason, [From.GetFullName] simply doesn't infuriate you as much as [From.GetSheHe] once did. It is a strange thing to lose an enemy, but not an unpleasant one.

You are not having a good day. Coming to blows with one of your best friends is never pleasant, and [From.GetFirstName] simply refuses to see things your way. You fear your friendship may be over, permanently.
The enemy of my enemy is my...
...friend.
...enemy's enemy. No more, no less.
may become your friend.
[From.GetFullName] and [FromFrom.GetFullName] - those underhanded weasels. They think you don't know, but you've seen the two of them conspiring behind your back.
You tried to approach [From.GetFirstName], but apparently [From.GetSheHe] simply doesn't seen things the way you do. It appears the two of you will go on simply sharing a common enemy.
You and [From.GetFullName] both share a mutual friend, one who is eager to see the two of you become friends as well.
All for one, and one for all!
Friendship isn't transitive, you realize.
may become your friend.
You're glad to see that two of your best friends, [From.GetFullName] and [FromFrom.GetFullName], have begun enjoying each others presence more and more. The three of you have become inseparable.
It seems like [From.GetFirstName] simply doesn't see things the way you do. The two of you simply haven't managed to connect.
You have been spending a lot of time with [From.GetFullName] lately.
We should be friends!
I can't stand [From.GetHerHis] stupid face.
I'll just keep to myself.
might become your friend.
You and [From.GetFullName] have been spending a lot of time together lately. [From.GetSheHeCap] says [From.GetSheHe] wants to be friends with you.
Sure, I'll be your friend!
Leave me alone!
One of your close friends is deeply in debt, and as it happens, you have a few spare credits lying around. Perhaps you could help them out?
A friend in need...
I have troubles of my own.

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Financial problems
Sorry to hear about your financial situation. Here, from one friend to another. Hope it helps!
